scripts.dev:react-chat: pnpm --filter moki-sdk dev & pnpm --filter react-chat dev
scripts.size:minified: pnpm build && esbuild src/_esm/index.js --bundle --minify --format=esm --external:viem --external:@noble/curves --external:scale-ts --outfile=.size-test.js && ls -lh .size-test.js && gzip -c .size-test.js | wc -c | awk '{printf "Gzipped: %.2f KB\n", $1/1024}' && brotli -c .size-test.js | wc -c | awk '{printf "Brotli: %.2f KB\n", $1/1024}' && rm .size-test.js
